name: games
description: This table contains all NBA games since NBA was found in 1949.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier of an NBA game.

columns.name: game_date
columns.description: When the game was played (calculated with EST time).

columns.name: season
columns.description: A year of a NBA season.

columns.name: home_team_id
columns.description: An ID of a team that played on their home court.

columns.name: visitor_team_id
columns.description: An ID of a visiting team.

columns.name: game_type
columns.description: Type of a game depending on when it was played during a season. Possible values are **preseason**, **regular**, **allstar**, **playin** or **playoff**.

columns.name: home_team_points
columns.description: How many points a home team scored.

columns.name: visitor_team_points
columns.description: How many points a visiting team scored.
